name: Fort Knight (AKZ Dev)
description:
Guide a knight stuck in a forever time loop to his long lost fort. Solve puzzles, defeat enemies, and collect food pickups as you escape the time-loop.

Made for the Black and White Game Jam #8

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow keys to move
  • Space key to attack enemies
  • Skull Button (or X key) to kill player
  • Replay Button to restart the level

Pickup food items to gain moves and reach the flag inside of the fort to complete the level.

Credits:

  • Most assets from Kenney: 1-Bit Pack
  • Music from freesound.org: gameMusic by Magntron
